revised_title: Investigation of Unidentified Lines in the Spectrum of e Orionis (Alnitam)
tldr: The authors investigate unidentified lines in the spectrum of e Orionis (Alnitam) and discover that two of the lines are due to silicium impurities in the chromium used. They also find that the remaining lines are due to nitrogen under certain conditions of current, which abnormally strengthen the lines relatively to other nitrogen lines.
